parameter.label: ${lbl:b_application}@{select smn_seguridad.s_application.app_id as id, smn_seguridad.s_application.app_alias as item from smn_seguridad.s_application order by 1}
${lbl:b_role}@{select smn_seguridad.s_role.role_id as id, smn_seguridad.s_role.rolename as item from smn_seguridad.s_role where smn_seguridad.s_role.app_id = "${def:alias}" order by 2}
